Key Match Events: The Los Angeles Lakers lost to the Dallas Mavericks 118-97, marking one of their worst losses this season.
Post-Match Reflections: Austin Reaves was critical of his own performance after shooting 5-of-14 from the field and having just one assist.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks were without Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving due to injuries.
Others: The Lakers have now lost three of their last five games and are in danger of failing to take advantage of their favorable schedule.
